contentTypes.name: 1_Component_Guidelines
contentTypes.description: INDIVIDUAL GUIDELINE: Start creating guides for your organisation. E.g. Button | Input | Drawer

contentTypes.name: 4_Variant_Section_Block
contentTypes.description: VARIANT BLOCK: Provide a visual example and description of the variant option(s).

contentTypes.name: 8_DoDont_Section_Item
contentTypes.description: DO & DON'T ITEM: Create an individual item for the Do &  Don't sections.

contentTypes.name: 8_DoDont_Section
contentTypes.description: DO & DON'T: Attach Do & Don't guidelines.

contentTypes.name: 8_DoDont_Section_Block
contentTypes.description: DO & DON'T BLOCK: Manage Do & Don't content blocks.

contentTypes.name: 2_Usage_Section
contentTypes.description: USAGE: Describe the usage of the component using bullet points.

contentTypes.name: 3_Anatomy_Section
contentTypes.description: ANATOMY: Showcase the anatomy of the component using a numbered list.

contentTypes.name: 4_Variant_Section
contentTypes.description: VARIANT: If applicable, describe and attach the Variant item(s).

contentTypes.name: 6_Behaviour_Section
contentTypes.description: BEHAVIOUR: Describe the behaviour of the component.

contentTypes.name: 5_Accessibility_Section
contentTypes.description: ACCESSIBILITY: Describe best practices for accessibility.

contentTypes.name: 7_UX_Writing_Section
contentTypes.description: UX GUIDELINES: Rules for writing content that is related to the component.

contentTypes.name: 9_Related_Section
contentTypes.description: RELATED: Attach related patterns or components

contentTypes.name: 0_Home
contentTypes.description: HOME TEMPLATE: Use this template to create your own design guidelines within Figma.

contentTypes.name: 9_Related_Section_Item
contentTypes.description: RELATED ITEMS: Add links to related components
